trans-unit.source: Provides a container for a group of commands or controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um contêiner para um grupo de comandos ou controles.

trans-unit.source: ToolBar controls provide an overflow mechanism that places items that do not fit on the ToolBar into an overflow area.
trans-unit.target: Controles de barra de ferramentas fornecem um mecanismo de estouro que coloca os itens que não cabem na barra de ferramentas em uma área de excedentes.

trans-unit.source: Only toolbar elements within a parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> can be moved or resized by the user.
trans-unit.target: Somente os elementos da barra de ferramentas dentro de um pai <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>pode ser movido ou redimensionado pelo usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>

trans-unit.source: ToolBar is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: Barra de ferramentas é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, que significa que seu cabeçalho e a coleção de objetos pode ser de qualquer tipo (como cadeia de caracteres, imagem ou painel).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ToolBar Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ToolBar controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Personalizando a barra de ferramentas de controle para aplicar as mesmas configurações de propriedade para vários controles de barra de ferramentas, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para que o controle uma aparência exclusiva.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ToolBar, see [ToolBar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e os estados que são específicos para a barra de ferramentas, consulte [estilos de barra de ferramentas e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ToolBar control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual só terá efeito se essa propriedade é presente no modelo padrão do controle da barra de ferramentas e é definida usando um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Você pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na seção "Alterando o Visual estrutura de um controle de" [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates where the toolbar should be located in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica onde a barra de ferramentas deve estar localizada no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> depends on the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, Band, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A posição do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>depende dos valores da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, banda, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation>, a band represents a row in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation>, uma faixa representa uma linha em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation>, a band represents a column of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation>, uma faixa representa uma coluna de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the relationship between <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>, Band, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve a relação entre <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>, banda e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Orientation|Band|BandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |Horizontal|Indicates the row in which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> is positioned.
trans-unit.target: | Orientação | Banda | BandIndex | |-----------------|----------|---------------| | Horizontal | Indica a linha na qual o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>é posicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: Toolbars that have Band set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|Indicates the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> on the Band.
trans-unit.target: Barras de ferramentas que têm definida como um valor menor de banda estão acima aqueles com um valor maior. | Indica a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>na faixa.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: Toolbars that have <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex%2A> set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |Vertical|Indicates the column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> is positioned.
trans-unit.target: Barras de ferramentas que têm <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex%2A>definido como um valor menor estão à esquerda das pessoas com um valor maior. | | Vertical | Indica a coluna na qual o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>é posicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Toolbars that have Band set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|Indicates the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> on the Band.
trans-unit.target: Barras de ferramentas que têm definida como um valor menor de banda estão à esquerda das pessoas com um valor maior. | Indica a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>na faixa.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: Barras de ferramentas que têm definido como um valor menor estão acima aqueles com um valor maior. | # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: The band of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref> in which the toolbar is positioned.
trans-unit.target: A faixa do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref> em que a barra de ferramentas é posicionada.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the band index number that indicates the position of the toolbar on the band.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de índice de banda que indica a posição da barra de ferramentas na faixa.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly set this property, its value is determined by the order in which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.
trans-unit.target: Se você não definir essa propriedade explicitamente, seu valor é determinado pela ordem na qual o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>está definido em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you put two toolbars in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> without setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A> and BandIndex properties, the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A> will be 0 for both toolbars.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você colocar duas barras de ferramentas em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>sem definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>e BandIndex propriedades, o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>será 0 para ambas as barras de ferramentas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>

trans-unit.source: The value of BandIndex will be 0 for the first toolbar and 1 for the second toolbar.
trans-unit.target: O valor de BandIndex será 0 para a primeira barra de ferramentas e 1 para a segunda barra de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> depends on the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>, and BandIndex properties.
trans-unit.target: A posição do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>depende dos valores da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>e as propriedades de BandIndex.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation>, a band represents a row in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation>, uma faixa representa uma linha em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation>, a band represents a column of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation>, uma faixa representa uma coluna de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the relationship between <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>, and BandIndex.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve a relação entre <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>e BandIndex.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Orientation|Band|BandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |Horizontal|Indicates the row in which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> is positioned.
trans-unit.target: | Orientação | Banda | BandIndex | |-----------------|----------|---------------| | Horizontal | Indica a linha na qual o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>é posicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: Toolbars that have <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A> set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|Indicates the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Barras de ferramentas que têm <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>definido como um valor menor estão acima aqueles com um valor maior. | Indica a posição de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>

trans-unit.source: Toolbars that have BandIndex set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |Vertical|Indicates the column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> is positioned.
trans-unit.target: Barras de ferramentas que têm BandIndex definido como um valor menor estão à esquerda das pessoas com um valor maior. | | Vertical | Indica a coluna na qual o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>é posicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: Toolbars that have <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A> set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|Indicates the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Barras de ferramentas que têm <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>definido como um valor menor estão à esquerda das pessoas com um valor maior. | Indica a posição de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band%2A>

trans-unit.source: Toolbars that have BandIndex set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: Barras de ferramentas que têm BandIndex definido como um valor menor estão acima aqueles com um valor maior. | # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: The position of a toolbar on the band of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição de uma barra de ferramentas na faixa de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.Band*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> applied to buttons on a toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> aplicada aos botões da barra de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the default style of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> controls on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade para alterar o estilo de padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>controles em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object* *property*="`{` **ToolBar.ButtonStyleKey**`}"/>`
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML *objeto* *propriedade*= "`{` **ToolBar.ButtonStyleKey**`}"/>`

trans-unit.source: A resource key that represents the default style for buttons on the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Uma chave de recurso que representa o estilo padrão de botões na barra de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> applied to check boxes on a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> aplicada a caixas de seleção em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the default style of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> controls on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade para alterar o estilo de padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>controles em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object* *property*="`{` **ToolBar.CheckBoxStyleKey**`}"/>`
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML *objeto* *propriedade*= "`{` **ToolBar.CheckBoxStyleKey**`}"/>`

trans-unit.source: A resource key that represents the default style for check boxes on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma chave de recurso que representa o estilo padrão de caixas de seleção no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> applied to combo boxes on a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> aplicadas a caixas de combinação em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the default style of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> controls on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade para alterar o estilo de padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>controles em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object* *property*="`{` **ToolBar.ComboBoxStyleKey**`}"/>`
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML *objeto* *propriedade*= "`{` **ToolBar.ComboBoxStyleKey**`}"/>`

trans-unit.source: A resource key that represents the default style for combo boxes on the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Uma chave de recurso que representa o estilo padrão de caixas de combinação na barra de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: Reads the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.IsOverflowItem*> property from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Lê o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.IsOverflowItem*>propriedade do elemento especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.IsOverflowItem*>

trans-unit.source: The element from which to read the property.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual ler a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Reads the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.OverflowMode*> property from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Lê o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.OverflowMode*>propriedade do elemento especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.OverflowMode*>

trans-unit.source: For the possible mode values, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.OverflowMode>.
trans-unit.target: Para os valores do modo possíveis, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.OverflowMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.OverflowMode>

trans-unit.source: The element from which to read the property.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual ler a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the toolbar has items that are not visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a barra de ferramentas tem itens que não estão visíveis.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> has more items than it has the space to show, it puts the remaining items in its overflow area.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>tem mais itens do que tem o espaço para mostrar, ele coloca os itens restantes na sua área de excedentes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: The user can click the arrow on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> to access the overflow items.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode clicar na seta no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>para acessar os itens de estouro.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there are items on the toolbar that are not visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se houver itens na barra de ferramentas que não são visíveis; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.HasOverflowItems*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.HasOverflowItems*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.HasOverflowItems*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.IsOverflowItem*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.IsOverflowItem*>propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.IsOverflowItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref> overflow area is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref> área de estouro é visível no momento.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the overflow area is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a área de estouro é visível; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.IsOverflowOpen*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.IsOverflowOpen*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.IsOverflowOpen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Remeasures a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remeasures um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The measurement constraints.
trans-unit.target: As restrições de medida.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref> cannot return a size larger than the constraint.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref> não pode retornar um tamanho maior do que a restrição.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> applied to menus on a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> aplicado a menus em um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the default style of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> controls on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade para alterar o estilo de padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>controles em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object* *property*="`{` **ToolBar.MenuStyleKey**`}"/>`
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML *objeto* *propriedade*= "`{` **ToolBar.MenuStyleKey**`}"/>`

trans-unit.source: A resource key that represents the default style for menus on the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Uma chave de recurso que representa o estilo padrão de menus na barra de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um apropriado <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ToolBarAutomationPeer"> </xref> implementação para este controle, como parte do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: O tipo específico <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> implementação.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The arguments for the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos para o <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>evento.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when a key is pressed on an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> eventos roteados que ocorre quando uma tecla é pressionada em um item no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the user presses HOME, the first item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> receives keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário pressiona página inicial, o primeiro item a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>recebe o foco do teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses END, the last item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> receives keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário pressiona final, o último item do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>recebe o foco do teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, this implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando isso ocorrer, essa implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>eventos como manipulada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados do evento para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: The arguments for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref> routed event that occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref> loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"> </xref> eventos roteados que ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref> perde a captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> event data.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação não altera o estado manipulado (o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade) da <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture>dados de evento.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The arguments for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the orientation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a orientação do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property gets its value from the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade obtém seu valor do pai <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>

trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> propriedade de dependência.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: Prepara o elemento especificado para exibir o item especificado.

trans-unit.target: O elemento que exibirá o item.

trans-unit.target: O item para exibir.

trans-unit.target: Para os valores do modo possíveis, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.OverflowMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.OverflowMode>
